name: No Limits Matte Bronzer
about: What it is:A clean, talc-free, buildable matte bronzer that sculpts, defines, and livens up the complexion with a silky-smooth formula..Highlighted Ingredients:- Niacinamide: Reduces the appearance of pores and limits excess shine..Ingredient Callouts:This product is gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Sculpt, define, and warm up your complexion with this matte bronzer. The ultra-velvety, buildable powder effortlessly blends while delivering a sunkissed glow. Formulated with niacinamide, this bronzer gives skin the warmth you want while blurring the look of imperfections and texture.
ingredients: -Niacinamide: Reduces the appearance of pores and limits excess shine..-Green Tea Extract: Provides antioxidant benefits that soothe and replenish skin..-Sodium Hyaluronate: Helps retain skin moisture and visibly plump fine lines...Mica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Boron Nitride, Magnesium Stearate, Triethylhexanoin, Octyldodecanol, Isononylisononanoate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Aqua/Water/Eau, Propylene Glycol. May Contain [+/-]: Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Red 6 (Ci 15850)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For instant warmth, gently buff product into the hallows of the cheek, temples of the forehead, and jawline, using a brush. .-Build coverage as needed...Clean at Sephora.Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

reviews.review_title: Pay attention LYS packaging and design team!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Currently my favourite bronzer. I was a benefit u00ab Hoola u00bb girl for 3 years but this made me take a sharp turn and revisit my makeup decisions. I put this on my face and immediately after I had finished my makeup, my mom said it looked like I got plastic surgery (In a good way). When I tell you this snatched my cheekbones in, erased my double chin, gave me a nose job, a forehead reduction and put thread lifts in my templesu2026 I feel like Iu2019ve unlocked a higher tier in the makeup community ever since Iu2019ve owned this. Itu2019s very blendable AND layerable. It does not turn me orange (Listenu2026Weu2019ve all been there.) or gray like some other products do. I use a singular dollar store brush I purchased a decade ago to do my entire face, so this is obviously the work of the bronzer and not the brush. This is easily better than a high end bronzer some other companies can provide. For 26$ CAD, Iu2019m more than happy, It has the consistency of something an uber brand would sell for triple the value. Not once did I notice a break out in relation to this product, that and the fact that it has only improved since Iu2019ve discovered this. I was part of the cheek acne gang and I will attribute this to the benefit bronzer. Only issue Iu2019ve ran into is the packaging (The compact). Now halt in your tracks and listen to me LYS : I was super impressed, first by the quality of the mirror, it is not warped, does not present scratches, unevenness or cloudiness, very nice job on this often overlooked aspect. Second, it feels nice in the hand and itu2019s lightweight, the exterior is sleek and simple. When I reach blindly into my makeup bag, I know Iu2019m looking for my beloved equilateral triangle. And then the lovely magnetic mechanism, so useful for those of us with minimal arm strength and brittle nails who simply cannot apply turn into the Hulk and pry our compacts open. But your greatest strength is your only weakness ; The magnet completely broke on me. I donu2019t know how, why, when, where it went wrong. I p

reviews.review_title: This is the only powder bronzer I own!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For reference, I have eczema/oily prone skin with an olive undertone. Pictures have ZERO filter.  I love how easy this is to blend! It adds warmth without being orange. A bit of setting spray is needed to make it transfer resistant  I can dust this on with a brush and blend in with a wet beauty blender for no-foundation days, right over a freshly primed face. It blurs over a powdered face and it's buildable for glam looks. It can also be used as an eyeshadow or blended from the temple to the eyes to make my makeup seamless. I typically use this to warm up my forehead, chin and to hug my cheeks. It also bodes well to the 70's style of bronzer application by using a large brush to blend across the cheeks, hairline, nose, chin and jawline.  Overall, a solid performing bronzer with great undertones for a great price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

Having said that, if you have a pale pink undertone, this can look a bit orange on you. GO SLOW, it's pigmented! Harmony is a good shade match for me, but not amazing like Haus Lab (Shade 6). The formula is amazing, NO scent, huge plus for me. It did not accentuate my pores. The con is that it can have a slight orange hue if you go heavy handed. It's quite powdery and easy on the brush bristles you use.  If they had more shades, with different undertones, other would benefit from this brand and not complain about the orange tinge it gives off on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LYS seems to have no misses, because everything I've tried from them has been so well thought out and phenomenally executed!  I have a golden olive undertone, so lots of bronzers on the market look like straight up blush on me--way too red and orange. The shade range of these bronzers is gorgeous and without having a huge number of shades. Courage is a perfect, toasty brown. The perfect balance of neutral and warm to look naturally sun-kissed. The formula is buttery smooth but lightweight. It blends like a dream, so it looks natural even on bare skin. It builds up and sheers out easily. And it manages to do all that without silicone, which irritates my skin. So grateful for LYS! I'm not even interested in trying other bronzers at the moment, this just satisfies everything I could ask for in a powder bronzer.  Also love the unique packaging, relatively affordable price tag, that it's created and owned by a Black woman make up pro, and the self-love branding. Cherries on top!

I decided to leave a review because of the problems I've had with it. I felt like others should known the problems I've had with this product. It's just patchy and you can get better at the drug store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this bronzer! Great pigmentation, beautiful finish! Is super easy to blend and looks super natural, thereu2019s no way you can go overboard with it, is very very nice and buttery!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite bronzers on the market. It blends like a dream on top of powder as well as right on top of my foundation when I don't set my face. It is buildable which I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy how this bronzer adds such a beautiful warmth and dimension to the skin. I love reaching for this for my dynamic and full glam looks. I also love that this product is formulated with skin loving ingredients as well. This bronzer has just the right amount of pigment and blends like a dream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Bronzer has a beautiful natural finish. I enjoy that it is neutral on my skintone and long wearing. A cruelty free brand with Clean,  Skin-Loving formula

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m more of a Bronzer rather than Contour girl and when I say this has to be one of my FAVORITE bronzers itu2019s so smooth and it takes very little just to get the perfect application. Literally my Go to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love all of LYS beauty products and this bronzer is no exception. It is in such a unique triangle compact shape and has a ton of product in it. I love how it doesnt pull orange on my skin and literally makes me so sculpted and bronzed. I canu2019t believe the formula is clean yet so effective. I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is my new holy grail bronzer! It works amazing with my fair skin tone. It doesnu2019t come off too red or ashy, itu2019s perfection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how easy it was to blend. I could get a perfect sun kissed look with this. I love that itu2019s pretty affordable as well. I would love to try more from the brand now.

reviews.review_title: A perfect bronzer for my complexion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased several products upon the launch of this brand and the matte bronzer I purchased two shades. I purchased Strength and Worthy. Worthy is a Perfect contour for me and Strength is actually the perfect bronze tone and depth for my skin tone. At first youu2019d think that nothing is going on your face and then you continue to blend and the bronzer just seamlessly and magically melds with your skin producing a very natural and seamless bronze effect. This formula is in my top three best bronzers of the year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was nervous to try this as the image seemed a bit orange and that's always been my problem when finding a bronzer for my light/medium neutral skintone. I only require it during the summer months and didnt want to spend a fortune and I use exclusively clean beauty products...this checked ALL the boxes. The only thing left was to try and see if it turned me shiny or orange and it absolutely did not! It's totally buildable so I dont find that I regret using it after 1 swipe...its goes on easy and provides a natural tan finish without any shine (another box checked for me!!). Can't say enough good things, the price, the colour, the finish, the size (super adorable packaging btw) it does what I need it to very well. I'm so glad I took a chance on this new brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am shade DP5 in Lys foundation (dark with peach undertones) and I have been used this as a countouring instead of a bronzer. It suits the darker shadows of my face and makes my face appear more structured. I woudn't call this bronzing however, as it is not warm in undertone, but rather very cool undertone. The staying power is decent and the pigment upon application is very noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer blends really well and is a nice color on me. Iu2019m glad to have found an affordable high quality bronzer that comes in a great tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wish they would have come out with a more cool tone or neutral I absolutely love the consistency and how it blends but itu2019s just too warm toned for pale folks. Love their other products though. Will for sure keep buying from this brand.

reviews.review_title: This is the BEST bronzer I have tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is everything! Finally a bronzer that works on dark complexions! Thank you !! I love this BTW I am 420 in FENTY for reference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it's a very warm bronzer and very pigmented.  I'm of medium complexion but I bought the lightest colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how buildable this product is. I am extremely pale and usually bronzers look like I am putting dirt on my face. This gives a soft natural color that makes me less dead.  Plus the packaging is super cute.

reviews.review_title: Lovely, highly recommend, but needs another shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a red or orange bronze. It's not going to give you a glow (shimmer or matte) effect. This product is great for sculpting a natural face. Builds and blends beautifully.   This could be a foundation shade for some, it's why I took a star off. I feel it needs more warm (like saffron) GOLDEN in it. Yes, on lighter skin tones a neutral bronze gives a tanned appearance and would be perfect, but on a deeper tone, it's not so much a tan than we get from the sun, so much as it is a glow. I find myself helping out the product  With an almond colored loose powder.  Also shade is needed between strength and worthy. Worthy is pretty much a foundation shade on me and Strength is a too dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gorgeous bronzer which builds up beautifully!  Been using it the last week and I have not streaking issues. Iu2019m also able to layer ontop of my other cream products with no issues. Also love that it doesnu2019t show my texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this bronzer!!!  Every other bronzer I've tried was either too red or it came off as a contour...so, I was pretty impressed and pleased to know that I finally found something that works for my complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is gorgeous on me!! I wear either DPG1 or DG7 in LYS and I also wear Fenty 430. This bronzer is just right on me. Not super red or orange but does warm you up very nicely. Makes a great contour as well. Definitely worth the buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing pigment. i am shocked at the price. soo good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Picture is enhanced. Product is not that dark in person. Itu2019s actually very light in color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had high hopes for this bronzer, used color Harmony...looked very orange on me , cannot use this , will return

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is easily built up, blends like a charm, and doesnu2019t look cakey. I will say they do seem to be a bit on the lighter side, I have light and medium and in pan they look similar, but swatched is where you see more of the difference. I am light medium and even feel like I could go up to the dark shade especially with summer coming up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful bronzer! Absolutely recommend and I canu2019t wait to try the blush if it ever comes back in stock!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re fair, Iu2019d skip this. The color is what kills me, itu2019s very warm, and comes off orange on my skin tone. Such a shame though, because I love the packaging, and the actual finish of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could have for waited for  The medium tan I think it is but itu2019s out of stock. I got dark. I light handed with it and still work perfectly I use finish powder just to make it more my color. And the price is good. You should try it out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been reaching for this almost everyday since I got it. It's buildable, blendable, and stays on my combo face for 10+ hours.   I'm a Dior 2N in the summer and Motivate gives me a sunkissed look. It leans a bit warm for my undertone, so I haven't built it up too much yet (it's still pre-spring now), but it's lovely when I swatch it over darker parts of my arm. I have no doubt it'll work in the summer as well.  (I'm cool undertone, warm surface tone, so neutral works best.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this after watching a few YouTube reviews & reading the reviews here. OMG, I absolutely adore this bronzer! All the reviews are right, it's amazing. Right now my still winter skin is a light neutral tone. Went with Motivate & it's an excellent shade for me. I'm on the notify me list for the darker medium shade when I start getting more tan. It melts into my skin with a natural finish. It's the first bronzer I've owned that doesn't make me look muddy. Blends seamlessly giving me a natural glow look. So happy I tried this new brand! Going to order much more from them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The bronzer is very buttery, it blends easily right into the skin. The colour is a bit red on my skin tone, but I donu2019t mind it for summer since I always get tanner. If you are looking for a cheaper bronzer with excellent quality and soft application, you shall give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love the second I put it on. I went on a bronzer bender last year and I have a lot of variety to choose from. I have light skin (almost light to medium but a hair off). It goes on beautifully, it blends beautifully and looks like skin. it also has a perfect undertone it looks like a natural warmth instead of a Why yes, I did use a ton of bronzer today. Also it is pigmented bit not so much that you get that demarcation of this is where I started and spend hours blending out.

reviews.review_title: not reacting on acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone skin and i used to use the hoola bronzer but it would always give me small bumps. But when i saw this bronzer was mica free(clogs pores) i wanted to try it out. Now its been a month and my skinn hasnu2019t reacted once. I am sooo happy. Worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blends beautifully on the skin, not entirely matte which I like! Iu2019m a light skin tone and this shade is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer was such a pleasant surprise!! Very pigmented, creamy and easy to use!! You also can't go wrong because it's a clean product and the price is amazing! Put it in your basket ladies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I only have two other bronzers I ever use (kkw and Fenty powder bronzer) every other bronzer is either patchy or always orange on me!...got this and I love it! Itu2019s smooth, pigmented but blends out really easily and actually looks nice on the skin. Iu2019m very excited about this brand and impressed with this bronzer from LYS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this bronzer because it's not very matte and drying for my dry skin. It looks good on my skin. It doesn't look orange on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure if I got a bad batch, but I did everything to try to make this bronzer work, but mine was patchy. I have dry to combo skin. Light to medium usually and got Courage it  is such beautiful neutral golden bronze color!! Packaging is lovely, and no fallout! Wish mine blended like a dream like others have mentioned then this wouldu2019ve been my new go to. I have not encountered this issue before with any of my other bronzers. If it works for you definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful on my fair to light skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful on fair to light skin! Iu2019m very fair in the winter and I was a bit nervous about this bronzer but I took a chance and Iu2019m so glad I did! I LOVE it! Beautiful, high end packaging, easy to apply, color is similar to Physicians formula butter bronzer on me when I swatched all my bronzers but itu2019s even better! I encourage you to buy it! Also it looks super warm in photos but I have a cool to neutral undertone and it works well, itu2019s not orangey on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade motivate-light, Iu2019m light to medium skin tone with neutral undertone and OH MY GOSH this bronzer is so so good!!! It blends perfectly! No patchiness, itu2019s not overly pigmented to where itu2019s hard to blend out, itu2019s just perfect! I have a TON of bronzers and this is my new fav! I even like it better than the Charlotte Tilbury bronzer!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer has a very pretty colour and blends very easily into the skin. I wore it with the lys beauty cream blush in the shade self love and they go together nicely. For reference my foundation shade is too faced - mocha and butter pecan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No complaints here. The packaging is cute yet big enough for a larger bronzer brush. The bronzer applies smooth and even. I have both the medium and tan shades and can use both and they are different in tone. Nice additions to my bronzer collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Formula is very pigmented, soft, and blendable. Color works well as a bronzer. Not too warm but not cool enough to contour. Packaging is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this bronzer! Iu2019m around Fenty 370-385 with neutral leaning golden-olive undertones. The tan bronzer in courage is the perfect neutral, golden bronzer for my skin tone. Iu2019m not a fan of red tone bronzers because they look unnatural on me but this one is perfect. Blends like a dream and lasts for 8+ hours without fading. On me itu2019s buildable so I can get a sheer wash for some dimension on lighter coverage days or build it up for a more snatched look. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_title: Buttery soft and blends like a dream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is buttery soft and truly blends as well as my Marc Jacobu2019s bronzer thatu2019s 4x the price. The shade is phenomenal for my skin tone.
